item.title: Litter, 5th March
item.description:
Verges covered with litter, also along exit to roundabout to merge with the M5 southbound. Desperately needs a litter pick (as does most A and M roads)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 A417, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation overhangs footpath, 5th March
item.description:
Already vegetation here catches on clothes of pedestrians and with the growing season here this will only get worse. Please cut back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 199 Barnwood Road, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 Potholes as Road Narrows, 5th March
item.description:
4 potholes merging into one giant one just after the lights after the texaco garage and where you can turn left to hatherly road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of litter at entrance to Nortenham Allotments 5.3.23, 5th March
item.description:
There is a large amount of litter on the roadside at entrance to the old Nortenham Allotments 5.3.23.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 81 Greenacre Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge litter B4079 Seven Bends 5.3.23, 5th March
item.description:
The verge on the whole of the Seven Bends road B4079 is covered in litter - as well as looking awful, the is a hazard to wildlife. The road speed is too high for volunteer litter pickers to manage, plus there is no pavement so volunteer litter pickers would not be insured to collect on this road. Please arrange for this mess to be tidied up as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4079, Ashchurch
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Closed sign abandoned, 5th March
item.description:
Road Closed sign abandoned and dumped in the balancing pond at the top of Greenacre Way, Bishop's Cleeve, visable from the gate entrance on Evesham Road as photographed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 81 Greenacre Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing tree, 4th March
item.description:
There was a well established tree which was blown over a few years ago and has not been replaced. Three trees have been replaced in the Avenue recently but this one appears to be forgotten. It leaves a gap in the tree lined Avenue. Outside number 23.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Jersey Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 4th March
item.description:
The drain in the picture is to the far right as you enter the car park, and is completely blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Peter Pennell Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor condition caravan blocking pavement, 4th March
item.description:
An old caravan has appeared on the street but nobody seems to own it. It is in very poor condition and has been left half on road and half on pavement, not secured by the corner steadies just left on the jockey wheel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3a Marsh Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
